entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 70%
